attributes.action: Legal accountability for referendum or election campaign statements
attributes.background: The recent Eu referendum has shown that career politicians, their advisors and campaigners use mistruths, misinformation  and heavily skewed framing of facts to deceive the public, with no accountability or consequence. This petition seeks to hold all official campaigns to account for their claims.

rejection.details:
We don't know what you mean by accountability. We think you might want a similar action to this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/119416
